Name: Crust-Piercer
Description: The ancestral blade of the Lost Trinity, claimed by Garrick from the cooling hands of the final Chapter Master at The Death of The Cinder-Commander; it is the master-key of the Chain Breakers' authority.

Name: The Sovereign Link
Description: Features oversized obsidian teeth; gifted by the Doom Eagles survivors during the founding.

Name: The Iron Rain Seal
Description: Contains a shard of the first drop-pod to strike Terminus Nox.

Name: Slag-Stalker
Description: Forged from the first batch of steel smelted in the Iron Forest capital.

Name: The Steel-Rain Spike
Description: A single, oversized claw meant for piercing heavy hull-plating.

Name: Sunder’s Echo
Description: A heavy-bladed master-work gifted by the Storm Giants; its edge is tempered in geothermal vents.

Name: Phoros’s Debt
Description: Issued by Malakim Phoros; unpainted steel that never rusts despite Noxian humidity.

Name: Laden-Hand Token
Description: A piece of the Flagship's first anchor chain; brings stability to the soul.

Name: Smog-Piercer
Description: Uses a concentrated oxygen-mix to burn even in oxygen-depleted sumps.

Name: Rust-Bane
Description: Coated in a rare frictionless polymer from the Lux-Hemisphere laboratories.

Name: The Deep-Vigil
Description: Modified to detect bio-signs through kilometers of industrial sludge.

Name: The Scouring Drill
Description: Industrial boarding tool; teeth forged from recycled mining-rig grinders.

Name: The Forgemaster’s Gift
Description: Features an external cooling rig designed by Forge-Master Xavor.

Name: Soot-Walker’s Plate
Description: Reinforced with slag-glass; provides superior protection against caustic environments.

Name: The Piston-Blade
Description: Features a spring-loaded hilt for increased armor-piercing thrusts.

Name: The Verdigris Aegis
Description: Crafted from a hull-plate of the 'Gilded Lash'; it bears a permanent teal chemical patina.

Name: Titan’s Tooth
Description: Recovered from a downed Warhound Titan; repurposed for Astartes-scale boarding.

Name: The Chain-Link Bolt
Description: A specialized silent weapon for covert operations in the Iron Forest.

Name: Ash-Eater
Description: Equipped with specialized filters to prevent jamming in volcanic fallout zones.

Name: Garrick’s Resolve
Description: Heavy-duty variant with a reinforced carry-handle for one-handed suppression.

Name: The Vault-Key
Description: A thin, needle-like blade used for precision strikes in cramped hive-corridors.

Name: The Gilded Claw
Description: Salvaged from the 'Gilded Lash'; its blades are gold-etched steel.

Name: Tempest Teeth
Description: Salvaged from the 'Tempest Anvil' hull; the barrel rifling has been aggressively re-cut using diamond-tipped mining drills, causing the weapon to fire with a jagged, grinding roar that mimics the sound of a collapsing tunnel.

Name: The Sentinel’s Eye
Description: Salvaged from an ancient Watch-Keep; grants superior low-light accuracy.

Name: The Bubble
Description: A master-crafted suit of Mark VIII 'Errant' plate, the pinnacle of 576.M41 protection; heavily modified with reinforced seals and high-density stabilizers to endure the crushing gravity of Nox.

Name: Noxian Hearth-Fire
Description: Its containment coil glows with the same teal hue as the Noxian auroras.

Name: The Grinding Wheel
Description: Its circular blade spins at high RPM, doubling as a breach tool.

Name: The Ordo Shield
Description: Bearing the Inquisition's I; its field is tuned to repel warp-lightning.

Name: The Forge-Hammer
Description: A functional tool turned weapon; used in the construction of the Ring of Steel.

Name: Mantle-Breaker
Description: Originally a thermal mining drill; sanctified for the destruction of traitor armor.

Name: Iron-Sire's Breath
Description: Recovered from the 'Shield of Terra' crash site; utilizes high-pressure mining fuel.

Name: The Silent Foundry
Description: Forged in total silence during the Siege of the Magma-Gates.

Name: The Eternal Link
Description: The central icon is replaced with a silver-etched chain link, symbolizing the vigil.

Name: Anchor-Bolt
Description: Repurposed from an 'Anchor-Pillbox' hatch; establishes a mobile Ring of Steel.

Name: Sump-Stalker's Hide
Description: Treated with chemical-resistant resins from the Verdigris Deep.

Name: Void-Steel Buckler
Description: Forged from the airlock door of the 'Iron Curtain' escort vessel.

Name: Cobalt-Shunt
Description: Salvaged from the 'Cobalt Shield'; glows with a faint blue light.

Name: The Pillar of Iron
Description: The head is a solid block of high-density ore from the Nox-Hemisphere mines.

Name: The Heavy Toll
Description: When struck, it emits a low-frequency chime that steadies nearby allies.

Name: Noxian Storm-Caller
Description: Features a customized muzzle brake that mimics the roar of Terminator Line gales.

Name: Ossified Blade
Description: Teeth made from hardened xenos bone; specifically effective against unarmored targets.

Name: Hearth-Guardian
Description: Given to a brother who successfully defended a village for forty nights.

Name: The Corrosive Edge
Description: The blade constantly weeps a mild acid that dissolves xenos armor plates.

Name: The Unbroken Cog
Description: A gift from the Tech-Magi of Nox for protecting the Foundry Cities.

Name: Mortal-Bond Plate
Description: Includes a small compartment for a scroll containing the names of fallen Serfs.

Name: The Tectonic Plate
Description: Engraved with the map of the Ring of Steel; weighted for high-gravity combat.

Name: Anchor-Keep Protocol
Description: Coordinates orbital strikes from Deathwatch vessels with extreme precision.

Name: The Lamented Link
Description: A soot-stained generator gifted by the Lamenters; its field hums with a mournful frequency.

Name: The Bonded Blade
Description: Its hilt is wrapped in the flight suit of a fallen Noxian PDF pilot.

Name: Noxian Night-Eye
Description: Calibrated for the absolute darkness of the Nox-Hemisphere.

Name: The Thresher’s Coil
Description: Gifted by the Executioners; the head is a repurposed industrial crushing gear.

Name: The Magnetic Hook
Description: Salvaged from a Halo Margin hulk; used for high-gravity boarding actions.

Name: Link-Breaker’s End
Description: Taken from a defeated Chaos Lord; purified and reforged into a tool of justice.

Name: Xenos-Hide Cloak
Description: Treated skin of a massive beast; provides protection against acidic spit.

Name: Atmospheric Anchor
Description: Overpowered thrusters designed to function in Nox's 1.24 bar pressure.

Name: Vrox’s Patience
Description: Precision rifle calibrated to pierce the thickest smog of the Verdigris Deep.

Name: The Ghost-Anchor
Description: Flickers in and out of the material plane to deflect incoming fire.

Name: The Terminator Line
Description: The blade teeth rotate in alternating directions to maximize shredding.

Name: Cinder-Plate Segment
Description: A piece of High Paladin Garrick's original armor; a physical tether to the Chapter's birth.

Name: The Static Blade
Description: Inlaid with Noctilith; disrupts xenos psychic shielding upon contact.

Name: The Iron Pulse
Description: Utilizes the enhanced magnetic field of Nox to amplify its crushing force.

Name: The Final Anchor
Description: An impossibly heavy shield that requires a secondary power-assist to lift.

Name: The Hive-Piercer
Description: A short-barreled variant optimized for clearing cramped Tyranid tunnels.

Name: The Gravity-Well
Description: Modified to pin down fast-moving Aeldari raiders for the final blow.

Name: Noctis-Shroud
Description: Teal-dyed fibers woven with xenos light-bending technology.
